applications.name: 欧陆战争4: 拿破仑
applications.description: 指挥官阁下！欢迎进入18世纪的拿破仑时代每个将领都可以从列兵晋升到元帅，由平民变为皇帝。

applications.name: 转方块
applications.description: 新颖消除游戏，简单有趣的益智游戏，上手容易，精通很难，放松心情，挑战智力。

applications.name: 黑帮老太2：疯狂行动
applications.description: 刚出监狱就抢银行，黑帮老太激战警察。

applications.name: 海盗的世界
applications.description:
Axle is an adventurer and a dreamer. His goal is to bring wealth to his poor village. He jumps and hops through dangerous valley, rapids and obstacles using all kinds of gears to his advantage along with his trusty sidekick axe in search of great treasures. Dangerous terrain and monsters awaits! Are you ready for an adventure?

Feature
Fast and easy control! Complete an adventure within half minute to a minute depends how good you really are.
Fascinating pixel style of art and midi game sound, nothing beats old school style.
2 scenarios, each with 9 challenges (more scenarios to come)

How to play
Run, jump, attack and strive for that treasure!
Gain strength, jumping power and earn that treasure!
Use the virtual control or the gyroscope control to begin your adventure. 

Enjoy!

applications.name: 出口在哪
applications.description:
*** iOS 8 SALE - FREE FOR 24 HOURS ***

Welcome to Exit Zone. A mix of mind bending puzzles & crazy action.

The premise is simple - Exit The Zone.
The reality is MUCH harder! ;-)

Guide the red square through each zone, avoiding the white obstacles.
Use your brain to figure out the puzzles to beat each Zone.

> FEATURES:

• Over 40 levels
• 4 Zones - Including The Infinity Zone
• Hidden Paths, Multiple Exits & Levels
• Possibly the HARDEST game on iOS
• Striking visuals & dubstep sound track

> HOW TO PLAY:

• Touch left side of the screen to go left
• Touch right of the screen to go right
• Touch top right of screen to pause game
• Avoid white obstacles
• Utilize black obstacles to aid your progress

Download now, we will see you in the #ExitZone…

applications.name: 薪割
applications.description: 休闲小游戏，你的任务,就是砍越多柴,分数越高,与一位爱帮忙又爱逗你玩的老爷爷展开一段趣味之旅。
applications.releaseNotes:
修改排行榜
修正部分错误

applications.name: 咒灵诞生
applications.description:
When magic returned to the world, everything changed in an instant. All that remains of the past are the crumbling ruins of the fallen Age of Humanity. The old legends wraiths, goblins and werewolves now stalk the lands. Now, one born of their greatest fear will claim the power of the Runes and protect what remains of humanity. He is Wraithborne.

Wraithborne is a visceral Whack-and-Smash experience in a new dark fantasy world. Take control of a lone warrior to defeat fearsome monsters with a combination of unique gesture-based action combat, and strategic challenge in unlocking, upgrading and using powerful Rune Magic.

This title utilizes the power of Unreal Engine 3, and is coming soon for iPhone 4 or better, iPod Touch 4 or better and the iPad 2 or the New iPad.
applications.releaseNotes:
★ iPOD TOUCH 4 - Now supported!
★ NEW ARMOR! Upgrade your health and gain additional powers by equipping one of 7 new sets of armor!
★ LEVEL REWARDS! Gain Weapons and Armor by completing levels, and earn Gem rewards by repeating previous battles.

applications.name: 交通协管员
applications.description:
NEW: Play God with these amazing Apocalyptic Bonuses: the Tsunami Waves and Meteor Shower.

Keep the traffic flowing, avoid huge car crashes and see how high you can get up on the leader board in this totally addictive 3D game. 

Do you think you can make it? Think again! As you progress through the levels the traffic lights become time controlled and do not stay red for more than 7 seconds. 

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 
- Apocalyptic Bonuses: Tsunami Waves and Meteor Shower 
- FIRST 3D traffic control game where cars are turning left/right and you control up to 6 traffic lights 
- Two modes: Day and Night - Weather control: Rain, Snow and Sun 
- Universal 3D app with FULL HD/Retina Display 
- GameCenter with Leaderboards 
- Control 6 Traffic lights 
- Play with over 10 type of vehicles: 6 car models, firetrucks, trains, airplanes, helicopters 
- Beware of firetrucks, airplanes or helicopters! 
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
HOW TO PLAY 
Prevent crashes by tapping the traffic lights Get points for safely guiding the traffic Clear the lane when you hear the Fire Truck's siren! 
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 
Become a TrafficVille 3D Fan on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/TrafficVille 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/FanStudioUK 

Questions or Comments? Visit our website at http://www.trafficville3d.com or contact us at support@fanstudio.co.uk. 

**Please remember to rate us any time an update is available! Thanks for playing!
applications.releaseNotes:
- performance improved
- minor bug fixes
- gameplay improved
Please remember to rate us any time an update is available! Thanks for playing!

applications.name: 银河狂奔:冲向外星系
applications.description:
Become the most infamous galactic smuggler in Galaxy Dash!

Galaxy Dash combines the exciting gameplay of an endless runner with the thrill of space combat! Use lasers to blast your way through obstacles, engage in ship to ship combat, and collect valuable loot!

FEATURES:
- Dodge space obstacles or blast your way through!
- Destroy enemy smugglers and steal their cargo!
- Level up your Crew to enable special powerups!
- Unlock and upgrade an arsenal of powerful ships!
- Complete missions to increase your rewards!
- Colorful and vibrant HD graphics!
- Challenge your friends for the high score!

TouchTapPlay: "The game's graphics are so colorful and well done that it's really impossible to not get charmed by them."

Pocket Gamer: "Bright, cheerful, and with puffy space explosions, this is a sweet little game."

148Apps: "With its robust amount of opportunities for fun player interactions it might just exceed your expectations."

3rd place winner at Pocket Gamer's Big Indie Pitch 2014!

Download for FREE today!

Presented by SuperMoon Games, LLC as a Universal App with hd graphics optimized for retina display.

PLEASE NOTE: Galaxy Dash: Race to the Outer Run is entirely free to play. However, some in-game items are available for purchase with real-world currency. If you'd like, you can disable this in-app purchase feature in your device's settings.

For the latest updates:

Become a fan of SuperMoon Games on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/supermoongames

Follow SuperMoon Games on Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/supermoongames
applications.releaseNotes:
Captain! Galaxy Dash has an update ready to go!

- New weapon VFX for all damage tiers, enjoy watching the fireworks! 
- Introduced a new Faster Weapon Recharge stat and rebalanced several ships accordingly
- Midori showed up late to the launchpad too many times and has been kicked from the crew. The new mercenary Santiago will take her place!
- Added more depth and variety to the galaxy backgrounds
- Added damage VFX to enemy ships for better visual feedback
- A handful of bug fixes and general improvements

Download the update for FREE today!

applications.name: 单词连连看
applications.description:
比较考英语词汇量的拼词游戏。
选择好单词类别后，拖动首字母按照正确的顺序连起来，即可通过。
applications.releaseNotes:
We thought updating our design to use the new iOS7 look, but guess what?!  We already had a 'flat design', so we didn't have to make a lot of changes, just couple pieces here and there.
So today you will see that: 
. We made it FREE for a limited time
. We improve performance
. Fixed some issues with the game
. We've added new backgrounds
. More word packs available
. New iOS7 icon
. SPANISH translation. Si señor!

Tell us what you think and don't forget to rate!
